meanings.sent1: She completed the project independently, without any help.
meanings.sent2: The child wanted to play independently without any interference.
meanings.sent3: The cat acted independently, refusing to follow any commands.
meanings.sent4: The tree stood independently, unaffected by the strong winds.
meanings.sent5: The student worked independently, showing great self-reliance.

meanings.definition: Not depending on another for livelihood or subsistence.
meanings.sent1: The farmer lived independently, growing his own food.
meanings.sent2: The squirrel gathered nuts independently for the winter.
meanings.sent3: The robot functioned independently, not needing any maintenance.
meanings.sent4: The plant thrived independently, absorbing nutrients from the soil.
meanings.sent5: The explorer traveled independently, relying on his survival skills.
